name: Dodgy Rum
description:
Dodgy Rum is an Action Platformer where you cannot attack your enemies. Instead, you have to read the enemy and dodge their attacks until they're all tired out. Collect keys to open treasure chests to amass a huge pile of gold!

Credits

Kyle Englemann

Perry Kitipongpatana

Sound Effects and music from:

https://freesound.org

https://musopen.org

Up to date github link fixes level issue:

https://github.com/kylengelmann/GMTK2018
